text:
85
Other Institutions
REMARKS
Pacifica Foundation, Berkeley, California
KPFA is owned and operated by the Pacifica Founda¬
tion, a non-profit corporation. It has no connection
with any curricular institution. The station is con¬
ducting a pilot experiment in listener sponsorship
(subscription radio).
Luther College, Decorah, Iowa
This is a church college station. From 6,000 to
8,000 dollars per year come from individual and church
contributions. The school subsidizes the rest. Pro¬
gramming is at least 30% religious.
